advertiser_name: Overhead Door Company of Kansas City
ad_text: Overhead Door Company of Kansas City Sponsored HIRING BONUS! Overhead Door Company of Kansas City™, a DH Pace Company, Inc. is hiring Residential Garage Door Installers in the Olathe, Kansas, and surrounding areas. We are hiring both Experienced Door Installers OR Trainees! Will need to be able to safely lift 75lbs. overhead. Valid Driver’s License required with a good driving record. Company provided truck rack! For more information or to speak to a member of the recruiting team, please call 800-507-0023. If you have any experience in construction, as a general laborer, maintenance, repair-person, mechanically included experience, service technician, installer, carpenter, mechanic, assembly worker, or any skilled trade, you may find this opportunity to be a great fit for your career! Learn more and apply here: https://bit.ly/3GPvsvh FULL-TIME · OLATHE, KANSAS Residential Garage Door Installers Apply now
